title: Muse EEG sample export
description: Download format produced by DeviceControl; includes per-sample timestamps derived from capture time and sampling rate (timestamps length must match samples length).

capturedAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the first sample in the export buffer.

captureEndedAt.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the last sample in the export buffer.

samplingRateHz.description: Sampling rate used to derive timestamps; typically 256 for Muse.

sensors.description: Hyphen-separated list of channel labels included in this export.

samplingRateHz.description: Channel sampling rate; mirrors top-level samplingRateHz.

timestamps.description: Per-sample timestamps aligned with samples array (same length).
